added:
⚡️ Yooo. Thanks for adding me, I'm A Multi Featue PokeDex Bot . My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot, so I can give you a lot of informations about the Pokemon world! These are my commands: 
 
/start: Command list 
/data PokemonName: Get information about that Pokémon 
/usage: Get current VGC usage on Pokémon Showdown 
/addcode YourFC: Add your Friend Code in my database 
/mycode: Show your FC 
/newraid PokemonName: Find partners for a new Raid 
/faq: FAQ ❓
/about: Informations about me 🤩
faq: ❓ FAQ 🎭 A miltifeature PokeDex Bot ♨️ Made by 💠 @PokeTide💠
